original_title: The All New Adventures of Mr Blobby
overview: He's back! Everyone's favourite big, bouncy, big blob (well how many do you know?) In his new guises, Mr Blobby is a complete hoot, hilariously bumping, bashing and bruising his way through life.
tagline: More blobtastic adventures from Crinkley Bottom's pinkest star
title: The All New Adventures of Mr Blobby
